message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. This is a great deal for both of us, as it's well below my minimum asking price and still leaves you with a nice profit margin. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to be flexible.  However, $11,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $12,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can find a compromise here.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $11.50. Can you consider that?

Bob, I appreciate your continued negotiation, but $11,500 is still significantly below what I can accept. I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time, but I need to stay at $12,000. If you're not willing to go higher, I may need to explore other options.
